page.title: 10A TYPICAL WEDNESDAY
page.content:
{WEDNESDAY 12TH JUNE 1985
I got up, washed my hair, blow-dried it, had a wash and got my books ready for school. I left my house at 8.35 a.m. and walked to school arriving about 8.45. I walked into class and was talking to{Claire.}First it was {form period.} We finished the{Middle Ages Poster.} Then it was{Drama.}I was picked to be in{Darren Thomas's}group, along with{ {Claire and Sharon.}We made up a play called{'Kerry'.}After break we had {'French'}with{Mrs. O'Connell.}We learned how to say the months of the year in french. After dinner we had{Art}with{Mr. {Bradridge.}We drew some sign posts. Then I had{Maths}with{Mr. McClean.}We learnt about fractions. I went home, watched T.V.,had tea and went to bed.
